column1: Definition: Net foreign direct investment and portfolio investment, expressed as a percentage of GDP.
Source: HDRO calculations based on data from World Bank (2020a). World Development Indicators database. Washington, DC. http://data.worldbank.org. Accessed on 22 July 2020.

column2: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development

column1: a: Data refer to 2019 or the most recent year available.
